text: Amelyn Jean Veloso (April 25, 1974 - September 25, 2020) was a Filipina broadcast journalist of CNN Philippines. She was the anchor of morning show New Day, Morning Newsroom, and public service program Serbisyo All Access. She was born in Cebu City, Philippines. She was a co-anchor of Solar Daybreak from 7 January 2013 until her death in 2017. until 2014. On September 25, 2020, Veloso died due to complications from liver cancer in Manila at the age of 46. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1974 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:Filipino journalists Category:People from Cebu Category:Cancer deaths in the Philippines
title: Amelyn Veloso
